text: The Battle of Homs (or Battle of Hims) may refer to: *First Battle of Homs (1260) *Second Battle of Homs (1281) *Battle of Wadi al-Khazandar (1299) *Battle of Homs (1832) *Siege of Homs (2011–2014) **2012 Homs offensive ==See also== *Battle of Emesa (272) *Siege of Emesa (636) *Battle of Marj al-Saffar, Spring 1303
title: Battle of Homs
